flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This Bull is made out of Chicken wire, spray foam and Texas long horn , horns.
guide.introduction_rendered: This Bull is made out of Chicken wire, spray foam and Texas long horn , horns.

lines.text: Start with chicken wire the smallest you can find, if it has larger holes you can double it!  Then form the base of the body amd cut out a space in the middle just big enough to squeeze in,,
lines.text_raw: Start with chicken wire the smallest you can find, if it has larger holes you can double it!  Then form the base of the body amd cut out a space in the middle just big enough to squeeze in,,

lines.text: Then put on gloves and spray a can of spray foam on top of the chicken wire start with just getting enough to cover the wire and then let it dry for an hour, and then go back over it!  the neck and Head are also formed wire into the shape of a bull head . and attach to the body, and I made the bulls tongue move so leave room in the back to pull the wires thru, along with lights for the eyes,
lines.text_raw: Then put on gloves and spray a can of spray foam on top of the chicken wire start with just getting enough to cover the wire and then let it dry for an hour, and then go back over it!  the neck and Head are also formed wire into the shape of a bull head . and attach to the body, and I made the bulls tongue move so leave room in the back to pull the wires thru, along with lights for the eyes,

guide.summary: A Bull made from spray foam
guide.title: Bull rider
